title: First-Run Wizard Overview
content:
When you launch the application for the first time, you'll go through a quick setup wizard that takes about 5 minutes to complete.

## What the Wizard Configures

The wizard will guide you through:

1. **Language Selection** - Choose English or Hebrew (עברית)
2. **Admin Password Setup** - Create a master password to protect your settings
3. **Database Mode** - Select Standalone (SQLite) or Enterprise (SQL Server)
4. **Projector Configuration** - Add your first projector
5. **UI Customization** - Choose which control buttons to show
6. **Setup Complete** - Review configuration and start using the app

## Tips for Setup

- Have your projector's IP address ready (ask IT if needed)
- Choose a strong admin password and write it down in a safe place
- Most users should select "Standalone (SQLite)" for database mode
- You can add more projectors and customize settings later

## After Setup

Once complete, you'll see the main window and can immediately start controlling your projector!

> **Need Help?** Each wizard page includes instructions and tips. You can also click "Back" to review previous steps.
